qas.question: How is access to mail provided?

answers.text: implementing Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) and possibly providing access to messages through Internet Message Access Protocol (IMAP), the Post Office Protocol, Webmail, or a proprietary protocol.

qas.question: what are most mailbox providers as well?
who possibly controls their own mail servers?

answers.text: companies, universities, organizations, groups, and individuals

qas.question: All mailbox providers were also what?

plausible_answers.text: Yahoo! Mail, Outlook.com, Gmail, AOL Mail, Po box

qas.question: What are examples of access providers?
What is used by organizations that depend on others to provide mail services?

Thư, Outlook.com, Gmail, AOL Mail, hộp Po <b6_0/> ).
